channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Blacks Loudly Declare Their Lack of Support for a Kamala Harris Presidency
Judge permanently blocks part of Florida's 'Stop WOKE Act' as unconstitutional on First Amendment grounds
item.description: A federal judge delivered a final blow to the part of Florida's "Stop Woke Act" that sought to ban critical race theory training in private workplaces.

item.title: Karoline Leavitt to Newsmax: Shame on Media for Bullet Conspiracy
item.description: Karoline Leavitt, national press secretary for the Trump presidential campaign, shamed mainstream media outlets Friday night for suggesting former President Donald Trump wasn't hit by a bullet two weeks ago in Butler, Pennsylvania. A local law enforcement source suggested...

item.title: Feel-Good Friday: 'Folds of Honor' Gives Scholarships to the Families of Fallen and Disabled Vets
Trump knocks Harris as a 'bum,' scorns her handling of southern border: 'A failed vice president'
item.description: Former President Trump criticized Vice President Kamala Harris for the influx of migrants flowing through the southern border under the Biden administration.

item.title: Federal Judge Blocks Piece of DeSantis' 'Stop Woke Act'
item.description: A federal judge is barring a central piece of Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis' "Stop Woke Act" that restricts trainings about race in the workplace, issuing the blow Friday, reported Politico.

item.title: Friday Funnies: Hilarious Parody Campaign Ad Beautifully Exposes Kamala's Monumental Flaws
Harris vs. Trump: 100 days from election, it's a dramatically altered presidential race
item.description: This weekend marks 100 days until Election Day and one week since President Biden's announcement he was ending his re-election rematch against former President Trump & endorsing Vice President Harris

item.title: Rep. Crenshaw to Newsmax: Harris 'Certainly Was' Border Czar
item.description: Rep. Dan Crenshaw, R-Texas, told Newsmax on Friday that it would be a mistake for Democrats and the liberal media to rewrite history and try to claim Vice President Kamala Harris was never President Joe Biden's "border czar" because Republicans have the receipts to prove ...

item.title: Putin's War, Week 126. Ukraine and Hungary Square Off, More Peace Talk by Putin, and the Escalation Flop
House lawmakers leave DC until September with government shutdown deadline looming
item.description: The House of Representatives is on recess until Sept. 9 â€“ exactly three weeks ahead of the deadline to fund the government in the next fiscal year.

item.title: Calif. Gov. Newsom Pleads for More Police Chases in Oakland
item.description: Democrat California Gov. Gavin Newsom pleaded with officials in his state to change their policy regarding criminal chases amid a skyrocketing crime spree, reported The Daily Caller. Newsom sent a letter to Oakland officials, including the city's mayor, police department,...

item.title: Lefty CNN Hack Tries to Spin New Michigan Poll As 'Zero' Black People Wanting to Vote for Trump
Newsom urges Oakland officials to tighten 'extreme' policy that restricts police chases
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom is urging Oakland officials to change a policy that restricts when cops can pursue a criminal suspect, saying it allows "criminals to act with impunity."

item.title: Trump to Catholic Group: I Will Defend Religious Liberty
item.description: Former President Donald Trump told a group of conservative Catholics on Friday that if elected in November, his administration will defend religious liberty and the values of the American family and issued warnings of the consequence if his likely opponent, Vice President ...
